templateHistory.lhs:
%{ game.macros.getName("Sinless Item Roll")?.execute({ itemUuid: item.uuid }); }%
${actionLabel ? actionLabel : "Use"}$
templateHistory.rhs: %{(async()=>{ui.notifications.info("Firing: "+item.name);const m=game.macros.getName("Sinless Item Roll");if(!m)return ui.notifications.error("Macro not found: Sinless Item Roll");m.execute({itemUuid:item.uuid});})()}% ${actionLabel ? actionLabel : "Use"}$
